description: This file defines a RecyclerView adapter called VideosRowAdapter used for displaying a list of videos in a horizontally scrollable row, likely in an Android TV application. It manages item focus visuals, handles user input via key events, and provides accessibility features, such as custom content descriptions. The adapter binds video data to views, handles favorite and progress overlays, and facilitates accessibility via content descriptions.

classes.name: VideosRowAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of videos with focus handling and accessibility support.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item layout and creates a ViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds video data to the ViewHolder and sets focus and key event handling.

methods.name: setFocusedIndex
methods.description: Updates the focused item's index and refreshes the list.

classes.name: VideoVH
classes.description: ViewHolder class for individual video items, manages view references and focus/selection states.

methods.name: applyFocused
methods.description: Updates visual focus overlay and ring.

methods.name: bindFavorite
methods.description: Shows or hides the favorite badge.

methods.name: bindProgressPercent
methods.description: Updates the progress overlay based on watched percentage.

methods.name: bindA11y
methods.description: Sets content description for accessibility based on video state.
